Package org.oaad.Entities

package org.oaad.Entities
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    Benutzer
    Benutzer class Represents a user of the application Contains the name, settings and orte of the user
    MockDB
    MockDB class Represents a mock database for the application Used to simulate a database Used for testing purposes for the first increment later replaced by a real database
    Ort
    Ort class Represents a location and the weather at that location
    WeatherData
    WeatherData class Used to store the weather data of a location
